INSTRUCTIONS

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 433, 292, 448]]<|/det|>
- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 447, 761, 465]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 464, 808, 481]]<|/det|>
- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 480, 565, 496]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 495, 478, 510]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 511, 363, 526]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 526, 483, 543]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 542, 335, 558]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 558, 466, 573]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 573, 664, 604]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 605, 493, 620]]<|/det|>
